about: Hey Guys! My names Matthew or Matt for short, but most people called me Mx :) (It's just a nickname that seemed to stick, as I use the username Mxbro so much.) I love playing on Avicus, mainly cause of the awesome community that just makes it so much more enjoyable than servers that have people swearing every second. Everyone's just friendly. I joined about a year ago because me and one of my friends (who never plays MC anymore) wanted to check out a game "Ghost Squadron" which this server once had. After it was remade into a different style, I didn't play for a while, getting into other servers. One day I realised I still had it in my server list so I decided to play one round of Nebula. It was such a great match that I started coming back again and again, and now I try go on at least every day. Anyway guys, sorry for the super long paragraph, and congratulations if you bothered to read this far!
interests: Basketball, Gaming, Writing, Building and Pvp.
